product_name: Marmot Guides Down Vest - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you wear it on multiday adventures or outings near home, the men's Marmot Guides down vest uses 650-fill goose down to provide reliable insulation in a lightweight package. Insulated with quality 650-fill-power goose down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. DriClime(R)-lined collar and chin flap are soft and comfortable next to skin. Interior zippered pocket doubles as a stuff sack. Zippered handwarmer pockets with tricot lining protect fingers from the cold. Windflap behind zipper protects against drafts. The men's Marmot Guides down vest features an elastic drawcord hem that lets you cinch the waist to guard heat. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you wear it on multiday adventures or outings near home, the men's Marmot Guides down vest uses 650-fill goose down to provide reliable insulation in a lightweight package.
